name: Good Times Cheeseburger
description: Raise your hand if you like a good time! Well, have we got a burger for you! With each bite, you’ll taste a perfect harmony of juicy patties, melted cheese, and fan-favourite Big Burger Sauce. Add an easy side salad to your plate for a perfectly balanced, summer dinner.

ingredients.name: grated light cheddar cheese or crumbled fresh cheese

preparation: In a bowl, lightly beat egg, if using. Combine with ground beef and seasoning. Form mixture into four patties.
Grill over medium-high heat with lid closed for 4 min each side, or until an instant-read thermometer indicates a Food Safe internal temperature of 160° F.
Meanwhile, in a small bowl, combine mayonnaise, sauce mix, ketchup, and relish. Set aside.
Top patties with cheese to melt during last minute of cooking.
Place patties on bottom halves of buns, then divide lettuce on top; add toppings. Spread top bun halves with sauce, then cover.
tips: Customize as you like. Swap ground beef for chicken, pork, turkey, or ground soy.

products.name: Burger Seasoning
summary: Tired of bland burgers? Level up with one simple seasoning that’s packed with the robust flavours of onion, garlic, and red bell pepper, and a mild paprika kick. Just combine the seasoning with ground beef, chicken, pork, or turkey for mouth-watering burgers every single time.

products.name: Big Burger Sauce Mix
summary: The tastiest burger sauce on this side of the golden arches. Best of all, it’s free of sodium and preservatives. Simply mix the seasoning with mayo, ketchup, and relish, and you’ve got saucy goodness to slather on burgers, sandwiches, sausages, and hot dogs.
